name: Nord
description:
A WIP,  eventually will have many more levels. I'm currently taking a break from development to focus on college.

What is your fastest time? Post it in the discussion board!

This was the first "real" game I ever made and it has evolved over the years. I still add levels and I hope that it can be an actual completed game eventually.

More than a third of the game is easter eggs and hidden levels. Every time you find a secret you can screenshot it and drop a post on the discussion board. Make sure you tag it with a spoiler though!

If you have any ideas for levels, powerups, easter eggs, bugs, etc. just drop a post down below and let me know! I would love to hear it.
